name: Field Recordings
description: Material recorded outside of a recording studio for the purpose of capturing the audible illustration of an environment.

sub_genres.name: Nature Recordings
sub_genres.description: Recordings of natural phenomena such as waterfalls, ocean waves, and storms, as well as Animal Sounds.

sub_genres.name: Radio Broadcast Recordings
sub_genres.description: Recordings of transmissions sent by radio waves, used for sending communications to a wide audience.
